metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13222 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An information disclosure vulnerability in the Upstream kernel kernel. Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID: A-38159576.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> says "upstream kernel", no details on what the issue is sbeattie> looks to be code added by android, not in upstream. not in krillen or vegetahd kernels either

criterions.comment: linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
